Naming/MemoizedInstanceVariableName.description:
Description

Memoized method name should match memo instance variable name.
Naming/MemoizedInstanceVariableName.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyleForLeadingUnderscores: disallowed (type: str)
SupportedStylesForLeadingUnderscores: ['disallowed', 'required', 'optional'] (type: list)
